name: Hero Factory
description:
Hero Factory is a PC Tycoon-like game taking place in a medieval heroic-fantasy setting filled with humor. Create a paradise for heroes by building a town worthy of quenching their thirst for adventure.

Set up shops and services to satisfy every needs and desires of your visitors. Build dungeons and recruit hordes of monsters in order to create trickier and trickier challenges to entertain stronger and stronger adventurers.

Help your adventurers level up and become legendary heroes!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is only a demo, the project is currently on hold.

The Team :

Axel Jacquet : Project Manager

Guillaume Bertrand : Lead Developer, Game Designer
